channel.title: Where do I type commands?
channel.description:
Hello, I have searched but can't find anything relevant to my question.
I am trying to use the command but I'm having some trouble, I'm not sure where I type them, do I type them in in Aryan > Run? If I'm ment to type them there then I am doing something wrong because it just says: "[10:36:12] Unhandled command: ::item 1 1"
Thanks :)

item.title: Where do I type commands?
item.dc:creator: @meowmix101 meowmix101
item.description:
@meowmix101 wrote:

then download a different server source, copy their pickup code and put it where it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Where do I type commands?
item.dc:creator: @MrPickle MrPickle
item.description:
@MrPickle wrote:

Nevermind, I was typing them in the wrong place.

How do I use tele? Whenever I type it it says Bad Syntax, use # # even though that’s what I am doing:

::tele 0 0

Read full topic

item.title: Where do I type commands?
item.dc:creator: @aimx1 aimx1
item.description:
@aimx1 wrote:

In my server, its ::item ####

- id you dont need like u want to spawn id 1 u dont need to write 0001. Just ::item 1 and it will appear on the ground. Its like in my server, idk if it is on yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Where do I type commands?
item.dc:creator: @Simonrofl Simonrofl
item.description:
@Simonrofl wrote:

Maybe your ::Item command is bugged.

Try ::item 0001 1

Read full topic
